entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Belleville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:10 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. A few flurries beginning late this morning and ending this afternoon. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 36 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening with 40 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 13 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of rain mixed with snow. Temperature steady near plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain or snow or drizzle in the afternoon. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
